segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for the boy to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first time sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it’s getting closer to where they’re standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get caught if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and I’m worried the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem to notice how dangerous this is, which is a little scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want and get out of there before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a cute scene, but also a little nerve-wracking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
